inclusion.criterion: Having available blastocyst(s) cryopreserved by vitrification method.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: presence of any clinically relevant systemic disease contraindicated for assisted reproduction or pregnancy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of more than three failed cycles of IVF
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: body mass index of <18 or >38 kg/m2 at screening
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: refusal or inability to comply with the requirements of the protocol for any reason, including scheduled clinic visits and laboratory tests
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: trophectoderm or blastomere biopsy of the blastocyst(s) to be transferred
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Hashimoto disease, but it is not a contraindication for assisted reproduction. BMI is within normal range.
